00019 /* is this a pentium on a gcc-based platform? */
00020 /* #define PENTIUM 1 -- not a pentium */
00021 
00022 /* integer types (we assume int >= 32 bits) */
00023 typedef char int8;
00024 typedef unsigned char uint8;
00025 typedef short int16;
00026 typedef unsigned short uint16;
00027 typedef int int32;
00028 typedef unsigned int uint32;
00029 
00030 /* an integer type that we can safely cast a pointer to and
00031  * from without loss of bits.
00032  */
00033 typedef unsigned int intP;
00034 
00035 /* select the base floating point type */
00036 #define dSINGLE 1
00037 
00038 /* the floating point infinity */
00039 #define dInfinity FLT_MAX
